entry.summary: Warm, dry, and breezy weather continues today and Tuesday. Elevated fire weather conditions expected both afternoons, with areas of critical conditions north of I-40 in Mohave County Tuesday. Main area of concern will be the AZ strip, where sustained winds over 20 mph and wind gusts up to 35 mph are likely.
